formula: a(n) = 2*(sum(m=0..n-1, binomial(2*n+1, 2*m+1)*sum(j=0..n-m, binomial(m+j-1/2, j)*4^(n-m-j)*sum(i=0..j, (i-j)^(2*n-2*m)*binomial(2*j, i)*(-1)^(n+j-i)))))+(-1)^(n). [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 29 2011]
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=2*(sum(binomial(2*n+1, 2*m+1)*sum(binomial(m+j-1/2, j)*4^(n-m-j)*sum((i-j)^(2*n-2*m)*binomial(2*j, i)*(-1)^(n+j-i), i, 0, j), j, 0, n-m), m, 0, n-1))+(-1)^(n); /* Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 29 2011 */(PARI) v=sin(x/cos(x));forstep(n=1,default(seriesprecision),2,print1(polcoeff(v,n)*n!", ")) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 27 2011
author: _R. H. Hardin_
